code: @Override protected void execute(Terminal terminal, OptionSet options, Environment env) throws Exception { }

public void testEsPathConfNotSet() throws Exception {     clearEsPathConf().     class TestEnvironmentAwareCommand extends EnvironmentAwareCommand {          private TestEnvironmentAwareCommand(String description) {             super(description).         }          @Override         protected void execute(Terminal terminal, OptionSet options, Environment env) throws Exception {         }     }     final TestEnvironmentAwareCommand command = new TestEnvironmentAwareCommand("test").     final UserException e = expectThrows(UserException.class, () -> command.mainWithoutErrorHandling(new String[0], new MockTerminal())).     assertThat(e, hasToString(containsString("the system property [es.path.conf] must be set"))). }
@SuppressForbidden(reason = "clears system property es.path.conf as part of test setup") private void clearEsPathConf() {     System.clearProperty("es.path.conf"). }
